## ATypedArrayTuple.subarray() method

Gets a new T view of the ArrayBuffer store for this array, referencing the elements at begin, inclusive, up to end, exclusive.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract subarray(begin: number, end?: number): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  begin | number | The index of the beginning of the array. |
|  end | number | The index of the end of the array. |

<b>Returns:</b>

T
